testcase.classname: F01_Purchasing | user purchasing and item from vodafone web site
testcase.name: guest user couldn't purchase and item without filling personal information
testcase.system-out: Given Go to Vodafone Shop using URL.........................................passed When Select language as English.............................................passed And Go to Shop By Brand section and select Iphone...........................passed And Select any of returned iphone mobiles...................................passed And Press add to cart.......................................................passed And Press proceed to checkout...............................................passed And Select Delivery Options as Cairo Ain Shams..............................passed And Select Deliver to My Address............................................passed And Add address details.....................................................passed And Press continue..........................................................passed And Leave Personal info. Tab empty..........................................passed Then Assert on error message returned from Full Name field..................passed
